## BlockPolledSimStore class

Ethers-based [SimStore](./lib-base.simstore.md) that updates state whenever there's a new block.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class BlockPolledSimStore extends SimStore<BlockPolledSimStoreExtraState> 
```
